code: import logo from'./logo.svg';import'./App.css';import Start from'./components/Start';import Question from'./components/Question';import Result from'./components/Result';import{Route,Routes}from'react-router-dom';import{useState}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs,Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";function App(){const[num,setNum]=useState(1);const[score,setScore]=useState({EI:0,SN:0,TF:0,PJ:0});const updateScore=(type,value)=>{setScore({...score,[type]:score[type]+value});};const resetState=()=>{setNum(1);setScore({EI:0,SN:0,TF:0,PJ:0});};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(_Fragment,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Routes,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Start,{setNum:setNum})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/question",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Question,{num:num,setNum:setNum,updateScore:updateScore})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/result",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Result,{score:score,resetState:resetState})})]})});}export default App;
